data.title: Consistently Delicious!
data.text: Our family loves Greek's. We always orders the Greek Special and a pepperoni pizza. The crust is SO good- soft inside and a little crispy, buttery outside, like a breadstick. The sauce is slightly sweet with great, fresh toppings.  The prices are mid-range, not cheap, but not too pricy either. You won't be disappointed!

data.title: Delicious Family Food
data.text: Easy on the pocketbook and tastes great! Cozy atmosphere with limited seating. My family will definitely eat here again on our next visit to Indy.

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: Great pizza. We always great crust. Nothing fancy just good pizza. Fair prices. Plenty of toppings on their pizza.

data.title: I'm a fan.
data.text: Great for lunch or dinner. I love the white pizza! They have some nice lunch specials and great outdoor seating.

data.title: Great pie!
data.text: We got a large pizza to go and it was excellent.  My friend called it in and went inside to pick up so I can't speak as to seating, service etc.  But I can state that the Roma tomato, spinach and cheese pizza was awesome.  It was ready on time and travelled well for the approximately 5 mile trip home, staying hot and delicious. Ingredients were plentiful and the crust was great.  My friend said there was a couple there waiting on their 3 year old grandchild's birthday party so they obviously accept groups. I would certainly give them another try when in town again.

data.title: We love the breadsticks!
data.text: This pizza is delicious with lots of toppings and wonderful sauce. The breadsticks melt in your mouth and they come to the table piping hot! Great pizza at a great price!

data.title: A WONDERFUL NOOK TO EAT IN.
data.text: We have eaten in many both Italian and Pizza places throughout the country.  This was both one of the most unusual and one of the best we have been to.  Basically the pizza was unusual, delicious and well piled with toppings.  We were a bit questionable about ordering only the 12" size, but after seeing the next larger size at a nearby table, we decided on the 12".  Just to be safe, we also ordered two salads.  WOW!  The salads were huge, fresh and simple.  The pizza was absolutely delicious.  The only thing that limits the place is that it is tiny with only a few tables.  We attended it after the usual dinner hour and had no wait for a seat, but we would guess that during regular supper hours it would be quite full.  In summary, it is a wonderful place for those who like unusual and friendly restaurants rather than fancy ones.

data.title: Well worth the wait
data.text:
They have a very small dinning area inside however during the summer they open outside seating. It takes a while sometime to get your meal but the wait is WELL worth it, the pizza is fabulous and the service is hit and miss, if your lucky enough to get Destiny your in for a treat she is awesome! The others seem like the standard college or high school servers that would rather be watching MTV than working :)

They also offer pick up and delivery!

Best crust in town!!!

data.title: Stromboli Wrap!!
data.text: Had the Stromboli Wrap delivered tonight. I have to tell you it was absolutely delicious!!! This is the first time having the Stromboli, I normally get the pizza which is always good. But tonight I was just getting myself something to eat and did I ever make the right choice. This was my first but surely not my last GREEK'S STROMBOLI!!!!

data.title: Pizza, Like I Grew Up With, Just Right!
data.text:
I love this little place. The servers are informed and attentive. The pizzas are just right. I only get the hand tossed original crust so I have no idea if they offer other choices. What I do know is that the sauce, mushrooms, sausage, green olives and anchovies that I like arrive looking and tasting as good as the pizzas we ordered from the Italian restaurant when I was a teenagers. 
If there is any complaint it is that in can be very cold and uncomfortable in the cold weather when customers are coming and going, But that won't stop us from coming.

data.title: Quality ingredients for a depth of flavor
data.text: Greeks pizza has a delicious tomato sauce that cannot possibly have tomato paste and is light on spices so you get a sweet, fresh tomato taste. The cheese is fresh, too; melts and tastes fresh grated with no cellulose or mold inhibitors like pre-shredded cheese. I would recommend not adding too many salty toppings as it takes away from the wonderful tomato cheese taste.

data.title: Best Pizza in Fishers
data.text: Greeks Pizza everything has a unique taste. It's a melt in your mouth taste. I have tried several menu items and have never been disappointed. The atmosphere is warm and inviting. A must try kinda pizza joint!

data.title: Best Pizza in Fishers, Indiana
data.text: Wonderful Pizza - great crust.  They have daily specials and have FREE delivery which not many places do anymore

data.title: Good Pizza.  Not the best ever, but still a good pie.
data.text:
We were visiting Fishers and was in the mood for pizza.  Greeks was the recommended place so we checked it out.  The pizza here is very good.  I enjoyed the sauce and flavors, but found it a bit greasy, so used a napkin to sop it up a little.  I wouldn't say this is on my list of the best pizzas ever, but it certainly is tasty.

Overall, I recommend.

data.title: Good pizzeria atmosphere
data.text: A friend and I went to the new Geist location for lunch.  We were the almost the only ones who decided to dine in.  A few other customers picked up orders.  The service was prompt and friendly.  Beer and wine is available, but we stuck to soft drinks for lunch.  The salad was fresh.  The dressing choices are limited to 3 and none are light.  This is a drawback in my view.  The pizza was delicious with a soft crust.  The ingredients tasted fresh.  The topping selections are pretty typical, so there is nothing unusual here.

data.title: Some of the Best pizza I've had
data.text: I would personally give it FIVE stars but my husband thought it was just average. I thought the crust was absolutely delicious, the cheese super fresh, and pepperoni was fabulous. I consider it a favorite.

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: The first local pizza place I tried the day after moving in town. I lived off 116th street and passed when I was going home. Glad i picked to eat there!

data.title: XL PIZZA-GOOD!
data.text: Just a pick up order this time. Coupon value - $10.00. Pretty good pizza pie. Would also like to try other menu items. Will look forward to our next visit!

data.title: Interesting stop
data.text: We stopped in the eve night for pizza. We were the only ones in the restaurant when we stopped, but it soon filled up. We enjoyed the pizza very much. It is a little on the sweet side with the sauce, but very nice. We enjoyed our evening.

data.title: Not bad.
data.text: Great ham and cheese calzone...after that, nothing too thrilling. The pizza always seems to be undercooked to me.
